IRS990.MissionDesc: TO SECURE FINANCIAL SUPPORT FOR THE PURPOSE OF GROWING THE UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION ENDOWMENT, STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS, AND THE DEVELOPMENT OF NEEDED PROGRAMS AND CAPITAL PROJECTS.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED SUPPORT TO ASSIST DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY IN THE ACCOMPLISHMENT OF ITS EDUCATIONAL OBJECTIVES, INCLUDING THE FUNDING OF PROGRAMS, THE MAKING OF GRANTS TO THE UNIVERSITY, THE FUNDING OF SCHOLARSHIPS, AND OTHER SUPPORTING ACTIVITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IN SUPPORT OF DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS
CHANGE IN VALUE OF CASH SURRENDER VALUE OF LIFE INSURANCE -80,815. INTEREST EXPENSE NETTED ON FINANCIAL STATEMENTS -8,736.
INTEREST EXPENSE NETTED ON FINANCIAL STATEMENTS 8,736.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: TUITION SCHOLARSHIPS FOR DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY STUDENTS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION'S GRANT TO DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY PROVIDED FUNDING FOR 475 ENDOWED SCHOLARSHIPS TO BE AWARDED TO DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY STUDENTS. THE PROCESS FOR MONITORING THE USE OF THESE SCHOLARSHIPS IS DESCRIBED IN THE SCHEDULE I ATTACHED TO DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY'S 2021 FORM 990.

THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WAS COMPENSATED BY A RELATED ORGANIZATION, AND THEREFORE NONE OF THE LINE 3 BOXES HAVE BEEN CHECKED. THE RELATED ORGANIZATION USED THE FOLLOWING METHODOLOGIES TO ESTABLISH THE COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE FILING ORGANIZATION: COMPENSATION COMMITTEE, FORM 990 OF OTHER ORGANIZATIONS, COMPENSATION SURVEY OR STUDY, AND APPROVAL BY THE BOARD OR COMPENSATION COMMITTEE.
RICHARD PAPPAS, MICHAEL VOLK, DAVE VENEKLASE, AND RACHEL RENDER PARTICIPATED IN A SUPPLEMENTAL NON-QUALIFIED RETIREMENT PLAN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WILBUR LETTINGA AND WILLIAM LETTINGA, BOARD TRUSTEES, HAVE A FAMILY RELATIONSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SOLE CORPORATE MEMBER OF DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION IS DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION GOVERNING BODY HAS ESTABLISHED A NOMINATING COMMITTEE. THIS COMMITTEE NOMINATES NEW TRUSTEES TO SERVE ON THE DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION GOVERNING BODY. APPOINTMENTS TO THE DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION GOVERNING BODY ARE SUBJECT TO THE APPROVAL OF THE DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY, AS THE SOLE CORPORATE MEMBER OF DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION, HAS CERTAIN RESERVE POWERS UNDER STATE LAW. ALL DECISIONS MADE BY THE DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION GOVERNING BODY ARE RATIFIED BY THE DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE AUDIT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE UNIVERSITY PRIOR TO FILING. A COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS ALSO PROVIDED TO ALL FOUNDATION BOARD MEMBERS PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUAL DISCLOSURE STATEMENTS ARE FILED WITH THE UNIVERSITY, AND REVIEWED BY THE CFO/EXECUTIVE VP FOR FINANCE. IF A CONFLICT ARISES, THE BOARD MEMBER WOULD STAY IN THE ROOM, NOT PARTAKE IN CONVERSATION UNLESS ASKED, AND ABSTAIN FROM VOTING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO COMPENSATION IS PAID FROM THE FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DAVENPORT UNIVERSITY FOUNDATION MAKES DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC IN ACCORDANCE WITH STATE AND FEDERAL LAW.
CHANGE IN CASH SURRENDER VALUE OF LIFE INSURANCE -80,815.
THERE HAS BEEN NO CHANGE IN PROCESS FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
